description:
Alessandro is a hot Italian dude that lives in the bread-basket of America.
He has spent the last couple years traveling the world doing high fashion modeling.
I enjoyed spending the day working with him. He's got all the trappings of an Italian dude (big sunglasses, giant diamond earrings, and the cross necklace) so he wears his Italian-ness on his sleeve (and on his back if you look at one of his tatts).
He was a fun guy to be around, loved showing off his big cock, and proved he was master of his domain by filling his dick up with blood in record time over and over again.
Alessandro also has a pretty amazing ass, so you don't want to miss that view as well!
title: Alessandro - Solo
